artifacts.summary: Research confirming task 852 is redundant - CoherentBundle.toBMCS was fully implemented in task 851

research_findings.summary: Task 852 is redundant. CoherentBundle.toBMCS was already fully implemented as part of task 851. The conversion is complete at line 580 of CoherentConstruction.lean with no sorries. The modal_backward proof uses the exact contraposition approach described in task 852's description.
research_findings.redundancy_reason: Task 851's Phase 4 (toBMCS) succeeded in proving both modal_forward and modal_backward completely, eliminating the need for the separate task 852 that was created as a contingency in case sorries were needed.
research_findings.recommendation: Mark task 852 as [COMPLETED] with note that it was subsumed by task 851. Update task 853's dependencies to only require task 851.

key_evidence.proof_strategy: contraposition using MCS completeness and saturation
key_evidence.confirmed_by: Task 851 implementation summary explicitly states toBMCS is FULLY PROVEN
